title: How to learn js
content: JavaScript (JS) is a programming language for creating dynamic website content. With it, developers can update both HTML and CSS, making web pages more responsive and interactive for users. JavaScript was created in 1995 by Brendan Eich while working for Netscape Communications. At the time, the language was called Mocha, but it was renamed LiveScript and later JavaScript to improve its marketing appeal. Today, itâ€™s one of the core technologies of the World Wide Web, and both the client and server sides use it.
author: Shrutakirti Chakraborty
